welcome-to-my-blog.title: Welcome to My Blog
welcome-to-my-blog.content:
# Welcome to My Blog

This is the first post on my terminal-based blog system. Here's a quick overview:

- **Markdown Support**: Write posts with headings, lists, and code blocks.
- **Images**: Embed images directly in posts.

## Sample Code
```javascript
console.log("Hello, Terminal!");
```

## Image Example
![Sample Image](https://cdn.aryanaryal.com.np/626c6f672d617279616e/70686f746f73/6c6f676f73/123852.png)

second-post.title: Second Post
second-post.content:
# Second Post

This is another post to demonstrate the blog system.

- Lists are supported.
- Inline code like `this` works too.

![Another Image](https://cdn.aryanaryal.com.np/626c6f672d617279616e/70686f746f73/6c6f676f73/black-logo.png)
